Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder and neck section of a dark-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393817) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393817)
